remarks: Closure of scalar product for a semiring left module.  ( ~ hvmulcl analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
statement:
slmdvscl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
slmdvscl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
slmdvscl.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
slmdvscl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
slmdvscl $p |- ( ( W e. SLMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( R .x. X ) e. V ) $.
